import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AppstateService } from '../services/appstate.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-errors', templateUrl: './errors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./errors.component.css'] }) export class ErrorsComponent { constructor(public appStateService: AppstateService){} }
